name: inaudibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unable to be heard: Music was playing almost inaudibly backstage. She murmured inaudibly to herself. See
inaudible
More examplesFewer examplesSomeone was muttering inaudibly in the background. Almost inaudibly, he pleaded "not guilty" to the charges.He started singing, almost inaudibly at first, then louder.
